venue.name: Cambridge T-stop Flyer Distribution and Standout

item.description:
On Saturday, July 28, 10-12 AM we will have
a Ron Paul flyer hand-out at 4 MBTA stops-
Davis/Porter/Harvard and Central. After a
quick lunch we meet for a sign wave
from 12:30-2:30 at Davis Square.

We would need at least eight people,
two at each stop and then all of us
at the sign wave.

There are 1500 tri-fold brochures
available for handout. Everyone is
encouraged to print out the campaign
material and bring it along to hand out.
item.name: Cambridge MBTA Flyer Handout and Standout
